name: sticlo's curse
description:
This is a short platform made for you to finish it as fast as you can.

 why? well...

Some time ago a ghost named Phantolo cursed a village. the curse kills anyone who stands still for more than a second.

Sticlo, the only one still alive, swears revenge on the ghost, and steals the relic that keeps him "alive", to throw it into a magic circle and break the curse "killing" it in the process.

However... 

Phantolo catches him in the act and is chasing him. Will he survive to break the curse?

Features:

 - 21 levels for you to run on;

 - a monster following you;

 - death, if you stop for 1 second


Controls:

(on keyboard:)

arrow keys or WASD: move or select in menu/pause.

Z or K: jump or confirm in menu/pause.

X or J: resume paused game.

(on gamepad:)

joystick or dpad: move.

A: jump or confirm in menu/pause.

B: resume paused game.
